-- 6. Daily sales performance
SELECT 
    CAST(TransactionDate AS DATE) AS SalesDate,
    COUNT(*) AS DailyTransactions,
    SUM(Quantity * UnitPrice - ISNULL(Discount, 0)) AS DailyRevenue,
    AVG(Quantity * UnitPrice - ISNULL(Discount, 0)) AS AvgDailyTransaction
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://adls4salesdata.blob.core.windows.net/transformed-data/sales_clean.parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS s
GROUP BY CAST(TransactionDate AS DATE)
ORDER BY SalesDate DESC;
